Public Remarks: The Ingram House.  A Fred Hollingsworth original design for the current owners in 1947. Beautiful 8050 sf private, flat lot just steps to the shops and restaurants of North Vancouver's trendy Edgemont Village.  History at its best.
Realtor Remarks: House is on District of North Vancouver Heritage Register.  No restrictions.  For showings also call Polly 604-671-7076.  Build new or keep a wonderful heritage treasure.
